nodes.text: Knox was a male Nautolan Jedi Padawan living during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Alongside with his master, the Roonan Halsey participated in the Republic's defense of the Temple of Eedit on the planet Devaron. Though the Jedi and their ARF troopers were initially successful in fighting off the Separatist battle droids, the Zabrak Savage Opress, a pupil of Separatist leader Count Dooku, turned the tide of the battle and cut through the Republic defenders. Both Knox and his master were killed by the Zabrak assassin. The Jedi's bodies were later recovered and transported to the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant by the Delta Squad.

Knox was a male Nautolan Jedi Padawan active during the Clone Wars a galactic conflict between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Knox was selected to be a Padawan of Jedi Master Halsey. Prior to or during the War, Knox built his blue lightsaber. Around 21 BBY, Knox and Halsey fought in the Battle for the Temple of Eedit against Separatist forces on Devaron. The battle was in favor for the Republic but the sudden arrival of Savage Opress turned the tide. Halsey ordered Knox to stay back from the fighting, and engaged Opress by himself, but proved no match for the Zabrak and was brutally killed. After witnessing his master's death, Knox charged Opress, but the much stronger warrior slashed the Nautolan across the chest, throwing him headfirst at the front door and ending the Padawan's life. Knox and his master's corpses were collected by Clone commandos of the Delta Squad.
Knox's body re-uses Bolla Ropal's geometry, but with newly textured finishes.
